description: AVINASH SHARMA is a senior consultant for strategic programs at a large Canadian bank in Toronto. He earned his MBA from the Queen’s School of Business (Ontario). From 2008 to 2012, he researched Sanskrit texts, including the Mahabharata, Bhagavad Gita, Upanishads and Yoga Sutras, to determine how Yoga-Vedanta can be applied to Management. The Yogic Manager is the product of this research.
name: Avinash Sharma
